casebody.data:
STATE FARM FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
DETROIT EDISON CO., a/k/a DTE ELECTRIC COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158265-6
COA: 332454, 333281 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 24, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing an answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before October 12, 2018.
